products.title: Infusion Asc Raspberry Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc raspberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

We love the idea of using fired earth in the kitchen alongside some matching tiling and worktops. Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed.
